definition: to seek an answer/to look for an explanation/to explain/explanation
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
hard to solve/hard to dispel/hard to understand/hard to undo
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
(of a body of people) to offer all kinds of different opinions (idiom)/to argue endlessly
(conventional letter ending) words cannot fully express what is in my heart (idiom)
the whys and the wherefores/the detailed story/root cause
